name: Gala Study Timer
subtext: A study timer built into your browser.
description: A browser extension built with Manifest V3. Functionalities include customizable timers that automatically change modes, an integrated to-do list, and progress tracking. Released in December 2024 and enjoys a steady userbase of 100 people.

0.alt: A screenshot of the timer in use, showing 20 minutes remaining.

1.alt: A screenshot of the timer. A side tab is open showing various settings for configuring the timer.

2.alt: A screenshot of the timer in use, showing 7 minutes remaining. A side tab is open showing two tasks, one complete and one incomplete.
